name: Dinner Tonight: Grape and Feta Salad with Rosemary
description: I had to find something to do with my delicious leftover feta. While I wasn’t exactly worried about it going bad, I was afraid that I would attack the whole package with a fork without coming up for air. That’s...
recipeIngredient: 1/2 pound grapes, halved, and seeded if necessary

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the cheese, grapes, rosemary, and olive oil in a small bowl. Crack pepper on top to taste.
In a large bowl, toss the greens with the vinegar. Season with salt.
Plate the greens on a plate and top with the cheese mixture.
